title: Schedule Wind Turbine Blade Leading Edge Erosion Repair
description: Drone inspections have revealed significant leading-edge erosion on several wind turbine blades, which reduces aerodynamic efficiency and energy production.

tasks.description: Review the drone inspection reports to identify all turbines with severe (Category 4 or 5) leading-edge erosion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of 12 turbines requiring repair.

tasks.description: Estimate the annual energy production (AEP) loss caused by the erosion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates that the erosion is causing a 2% AEP loss.

tasks.description: Obtain quotes from specialized contractors for leading-edge repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets quotes from three different repair companies.

tasks.description: Schedule the repair campaign, creating work orders and coordinating turbine downtime with grid operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a full project plan for the repair campaign.
